description: Gets the latest analytics data for a specific active assessment.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the assessment.

nested_items.name: noncompliantEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of compliance check evidence that Audit Manager classified as non-compliant. This includes evidence that was collected from Security Hub with a Fail ruling, or collected from Config with a Non-compliant ruling.

nested_items.name: compliantEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of compliance check evidence that Audit Manager classified as compliant. This includes evidence that was collected from Security Hub with a Pass ruling, or collected from Config with a Compliant ruling.

nested_items.name: inconclusiveEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The amount of evidence without a compliance check ruling. Evidence is inconclusive if the associated control uses Security Hub or Config as a data source and you didn't enable those services. This is also the case if a control uses a data source that doesn't support compliance checks (for example, manual evidence, API calls, or CloudTrail).

nested_items.name: assessmentControlsCountByNoncompliantEvidence
nested_items.description: The number of assessment controls that collected non-compliant evidence on the lastUpdated date.

nested_items.name: totalAssessmentControlsCount
nested_items.description: The total number of controls in the assessment.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time when the assessment insights were last updated.
